body_html:
You may have luck debugging your sandbox with --sandbox_debug: https://bazel.build/blog/2016/03/18/sandbox-easier-debug.html

Maybe take a look at tensorflow/examples/android/res/layout/activity_camera.xml there and see what the permissions are on the file?
body_text:
You may have luck debugging your sandbox with --sandbox_debug: https://bazel.build/blog/2016/03/18/sandbox-easier-debug.html
Maybe take a look at tensorflow/examples/android/res/layout/activity_camera.xml there and see what the permissions are on the file?
body:
You may have luck debugging your sandbox with --sandbox_debug: https://bazel.build/blog/2016/03/18/sandbox-easier-debug.html

Maybe take a look at tensorflow/examples/android/res/layout/activity_camera.xml there and see what the permissions are on the file?
